data.message: Mister so called Eminem I'm very disappointed in you the picture that is on this page of you is very disappointing I use look up to you listen to your music want to be you one if your biggest fans but not once did I ever think you would go as low as to worship the fucking peace of shit called DEVIL I wish some day I could get the chance to just ask y you would you do that I may not know other thank what I can read about you or what you rap about but I do know that your a great dad and guy just y
